Reviews.Title: “Be careful what you are selecting”
Reviews.Author: Bengikoksaloglu
Reviews.Content: I stayed 4 nights in the hostel. The location is central of old madrid. They advertise as having free internet and safe in the room, but; There was not internet in building until front of front door, where they put sofa ( although owner claimed that internet is bad time by time only in my room area) There was safe box in the room but it was not really free as it is said. You need to put 1 € to lock it and every time you open, you loose that 1€. My room and bathroom was very small So it may look relatively cheaper on online booking but i do not think it is value for money. You can get nice B&B with character in UK for that money.

Reviews.Title: “Great location,very clean.”
Reviews.Author: Bloated_ghost
Reviews.Content: Angela, the owner was a delight and gracious.Simple, clean rooms and location. It was within walking distance to all attractions. In a safe location.Most rooms have there own shower and toilet, very clean and in fairly good repair. Would recommend for those wanting simple,clean,safe accommodation.

Reviews.Title: “Well located, clean and safe”
Reviews.Author: bigbenbr
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this Hostal twice and highly recommend it. Its convenient location, price, cleanliness and the friendly staff are the best features of this place. There's no breakfast, but there are many places around where you can have a nice breakfast for less than 5 euros. Mr. and Mrs. Sanchez are the nice couple that run the place, you'll feel like at home.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, comfortable and safe hostal. Highly recommended.”
Reviews.Author: MeinenPeter
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the door to this Hostal and could have turned round without even going in - but then not wanting to judge a book by its cover, went in for a look round. We were greeted by an extremely friendly hostess who was most welcoming and showed us our rooms. They were perfectly big enough (given this is a hostel) and we had an ensuite. Rooms were immaculately clean, and were cleaned every day. We also got fresh towels, something I wouldn't normally expect from a Hostel.Our room had AC and little balcony. Location is great, very easy to walk from the metro, lots of little bars and about 5 minutes from the main shopping area (El Corte Ingles etc). All in all we thought it was excellent value and would certainly return/recommend.
